titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of the 11th Annual National Consumer Protection Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/23/2009--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of the 11th Annual National Consumer Protection Week. Encourages people to take advantage of consumer protection information.
